title: libert19
author: libert19
created_time: October 01, 2023, 02:31:10 AMLast edit: October 01, 2023, 09:43:02 AM by libert19
content: I have usdt, want to swap it to tron but I don't have tron to make swap. Send me 30 trx, I will repay soon after (including fees). For next 12 hours I will be online. Pm if you wanna help.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I got this sorted out, if you ever get stuck on this stupid blockchain, get out of it altogether, don't try to swap rather get some trx (30 is safe call) first via instant exchanges (simpleswap/stealthex have very low limit, I converted $3 worth arbeth to trx, use cheaper blockchain to convert from too, examples being cheap evm chains (arbitrum, optimism, polygon)/doge), then go back to instant exchange and convert your trc20 usdt to where you please. I tried to swap and it first took above $1 for approval transaction and on actual swap transaction, it asked me for $10, ofc I would refuse. This stupid blockchain is in existence and ethereum gets blame for being expensive.
